GSD.description:
arm64: compat: Do not treat syscall number as ESR_ELx for a bad syscall

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit efd183d988b416fcdf6f7c298a17ced4859ca77d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: arm64: compat: Do not treat syscall number as ESR_ELx for a bad syscall
